title: Segmentation fault
body_html:
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007fffec41a623 in THPFloatTensor_toNumpy (self=0x7fffb42f72c8, args=)
from /home/delta37/anaconda3/envs/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so

def _create(shapes):
    res = []
    for i in range(len(shapes)):
        shape = shapes[i]
        if not isinstance(shape, int):
            print(shape)
            tens = _create(list(shape))
            res.append(tens)
    if len(res) == 0:
        return torch.randn(*list(shapes))
    return None

x = Variable(_create(((10, 4), (2,3))))

python 3.6
